headline: Carrier Global Corporation (CARR): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Carrier Global Corporation on R. Dennis’s Substack by OppCost. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on CARR. Carrier Global Corporation’s share was trading at $57.07 as of January 27th. CARR’s trailing and forward P/E were 35.86 and 19.12 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Carrier Global Corporation provides intelligent climate […]
